_readme: Verified WoW in-game terminology per locale, confirmed by native speakers or in-game inspection. Read this before editing any locale file. Do NOT assume dictionary translations are correct for WoW-specific terms.

_notes.Crests: Singular: Écu. Plural: Écus. Tracker label: 'Écu:'. Full crest names: 'Écu de l'aube [tier]'. Note hero tier uses adjective form 'héroïque' (not 'de héros'), mythic uses 'mythique'.
_notes.Delves: Singular and plural both 'Gouffres' in common usage (plural noun).

_notes.Crests: Wappen (coat of arms) is the WoW DE term. Do NOT use 'Zinnen' (battlements) — common mistranslation. Full names: 'Morgenlichtwappen des [tier]' (genitive). Hero = 'des Helden', Mythic = 'der Mythen' (note: plural genitive for Mythen).
_notes.Great Vault: Full name is 'Große Schatzkammer'. Do NOT abbreviate to 'Gewölbe' in written text.
_notes.Raid: Schlachtzug in formal UI text. 'Raid' is also widely understood but 'Schlachtzug' is Blizzard's official DE term.

_notes.Crests: Blasones (heraldic term). Do NOT use 'Crestas'. Full names: 'Blasón del alba de [tier]'. Note: esMX uses a completely different word 'Crestalborada' — these are separate localizations.
_notes.Raid: 'Banda' is the WoW ES term for Raid (instance). The verb is 'raidear'. Raid leader = 'líder de banda'.

_notes.Crests: CRITICAL: esMX uses 'Crestalborada' (singular) / 'Crestalboradas' (plural) — Wowhead confirmed. This is completely different from esES 'Blasones'. Do NOT use 'Blasones' for esMX. Full names: 'Crestalborada de [tier]'. Note: Mythic tier uses adjective form 'mítica' (not 'de mito' like esES).

Emblema (m.) singular, Emblemi plural. Do NOT use 'Cresta/creste'. Full names: 'Emblema dell'Alba dell'[tier]' / 'del [tier]'. Tier names are masculine nouns/titles (Avventuriero, Veterano, Campione, Eroe, Mito).
_notes.Delves: Scorribande (feminine). Do NOT use 'Profondà' or 'Spedizioni'. Bountiful Delves = Scorribande generose.
_notes.Great Vault: Grande Forziere. Do NOT use 'Grande Volta'.

_notes.Crests: Brasão (m.) singular, Brasões plural. Do NOT use 'Crista/cristas'. Full names: 'Brasão Auroral do [tier]'. Mythic tier = 'Mítico' (adjective, not noun like other tiers).
_notes.Delves: Imersões (feminine). Do NOT use 'Profundezas' or 'Expedições'. Bountiful Delves = Imersões abundantes.

_notes.Great Vault: Великий тайник (masculine). Genitive: 'Великого тайника'. Do NOT use 'Великое хранилище' — that is an old Shadowlands-era term.
_notes.Crests: Герб singular, Гербы plural, Гербов genitive plural. Do NOT use 'Гребень/Гребни'. Crest tiers confirmed by human translator: [3343] Защитник (Champion), [3347] Эпохи (Gilded). Mythic/Gilded gear track label = 'Легенды'; gilded crest short label = 'Эпохи' (of the Epoch).
_notes.Mythic_mode: Official WoW RU for Mythic difficulty = 'Эпохальный'. NOT 'Эпический'.
_notes.Prey: 'Охота' is the RU event name (Hunt). The label TRACKING_QUEST_WEEKLY_PREY stays 'Еженедельная добыча' (generic 'weekly loot'), but item text uses 'событие Охота'.
_notes.Silvermoon: Faction name in WoW RU is 'Двор Луносвета' (Court of Lunosvет/Silvermoon). NOT literal 'Серебряный Город'.
